name: Notabenoid.org Dark Style v.2.0
description:
This style based on xob0t's Dark Style for Notabenoid.org.
I just corrected some css code fore better styling.
----
Стиль основан на Dark Style для Notabenoid.org от xob0t.
Я лишь откорректировал некоторые элементы и улучшил стиль.
additional_info:
Original Author: xob0t (https://userstyles.org/styles/166592/notabenoid-org-dark-style)

ChangeLog:

* 24.05.2020
Fixed lines between translation strokes.

* 22.04.2020
Fixed come in and come out block backgrounds in a project.

* 16.04.2020
Fixed color for updated chapters in Notifications

* 13.04.2020
Minor fixes of style

* 05.04.2020
Update style for some invisible elements
Fix color of active translation (gold color)
Update some button colors
Added feature for bold color of better translation («козявка»). It's already have a bigger text size.
